item.title: 备忘录称，高盛高管法迪-阿布利（Fadi Abuali）将在近三十年后退休
item.description: 根据路透社周二看到的一份内部备忘录，高盛中东和北非地区联席主管法迪-阿布利（Fadi Abuali）将退休。【原文：Goldman Sachs' co-chief of the Middle East and North Africa region, Fadi Abuali, will retire, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 微软查封了 340 个与日益增长的网络钓鱼订阅服务有关的网站
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Inc）周二表示，该公司查封了近 340 个网站，这些网站与迅速发展的尼日利亚服务有关，允许用户进行网络钓鱼操作，窃取了至少 5,000 个微软用户凭证。【原文：Microsoft Inc said on Tuesday that it seized nearly 340 websites tied to a rapidly growing Nigerian-based service that allowed users to carry out phishing operations that stole at least 5,000 Microsoft user credentials.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中美 TikTok 新协议与今年春季达成的条款相似
item.description: 三位熟悉新条款的消息人士称，唐纳德-特朗普总统与中国达成的协议将使 TikTok 继续在美国运营，并将其美国资产从中国的字节跳动公司（ByteDance）移交给美国所有者，该协议与今年早些时候达成的协议类似。【原文：President Donald Trump's agreement with China that would keep TikTok operating in the United States, transferring its U.S. assets to U.S. owners from China's ByteDance, is similar to a deal worked out earlier this year, three sources familiar with the new terms said.】

item.title: 日产汽车将关闭在美国和巴西的设计工作室，并缩减在伦敦和日本的业务
item.description: 日产汽车公司周二表示，作为全球设计机构调整的一部分，该公司将关闭在加利福尼亚和圣保罗的设计中心，并缩减在伦敦和日本的业务。【原文：Nissan Motor will close its design centers in California and Sao Paulo and scale back operations in London and Japan as part of a realignment of its global design organization, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，日本 JERA 公司正就斥资 17 亿美元收购美国页岩气资产进行深入谈判
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，日本最大的发电企业 JERA 正在就以约 17 亿美元的价格收购美国天然气生产资产进行深入谈判，这是亚洲国家投资美国能源行业的最新例证。【原文：Japan's top power generator JERA is in advanced talks to buy natural gas production assets in the U.S. for around $1.7 billion, people familiar with the matter said, the latest example of the Asian nation investing in America's energy sector.】

item.title: 预计美国环保署将于周二发布处理豁免生物燃料加仑的计划 - 消息来源
item.description: 据两位熟悉该计划的消息人士透露，特朗普政府预计将于周二发布提案，解决重新分配生物燃料掺混义务的问题。【原文：The Trump administration is expected to release its proposal on Tuesday addressing the reallocation of biofuel blending obligations that were recently waived for small oil refineries, according to two sources familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 高盛和摩根士丹利驳回 Archegos 投资者的内幕交易上诉
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）和摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）驳回了投资者的上诉，这些投资者称，银行的市场操纵和内幕交易助长了 Archegos Capital Management 在 2021 年 3 月的倒闭，该公司是由已被定罪的 Bill Hwang 经营的家族办公室，资产达 360 亿美元。【原文：Goldman Sachs and Morgan Stanley defeated appeals by investors who said the banks' market manipulation and insider trading fueled the March 2021 collapse of Archegos Capital Management, the $36 billion family office run by the since-convicted Bill Hwang.】

item.title: PIMCO 建议美联储停止解除抵押贷款以提振房地产市场
item.description: 美国债券公司 PIMCO 周二表示，美联储应考虑停止缩减其抵押贷款持有量，以提振美国房地产市场。【原文：U.S. bond firm PIMCO said on Tuesday the Federal Reserve should consider a halt to the shrinking of its mortgage holdings in order to boost the U.S. housing market.】

item.title: 瑞士经济部长在巴西签署南方共同市场协议
item.description: 瑞士经济部长居伊-帕梅林（Guy Parmelin）周二正式签署了今年早些时候与南方共同市场成员国达成的自由贸易协定。【原文：Swiss Economy Minister Guy Parmelin on Tuesday formally signed a free trade agreement that was concluded earlier this year with the Mercosur states, his ministry said.】

item.title: 雀巢公司董事长保罗-布尔克（Paul Bulcke）将在首席执行官被解职后下台
item.description: 雀巢公司周二表示，董事长保罗-布尔克（Paul Bulcke）已决定下台。几天前，这家瑞士食品巨头突然解除了其首席执行官洛朗-弗莱克（Laurent Freixe）的职务，原因是他未能披露与一名下属的恋爱关系。【原文：Nestle said on Tuesday Chairman Paul Bulcke has decided to step down, days after the Swiss food giant abruptly dismissed its CEO Laurent Freixe for failing to disclose a romantic relationship with a subordinate.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟 Discovery 下月将在亚太地区 14 个市场推出 HBO Max
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros Discovery）周二表示，将于 10 月 15 日在亚太地区 14 个新市场推出 HBO Max 流媒体服务。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery is set to launch its HBO Max streaming service in 14 new markets across the Asia Pacific on October 15, the media firm said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国家长敦促参议院防止人工智能聊天机器人伤害儿童
item.description: 三位父母的孩子在与人工智能聊天机器人互动后死亡或住院，他们将于周二在美国参议院的一个小组会议上作证，因为立法者们正在努力研究围绕人工智能技术的潜在保障措施。【原文：Three parents whose children died or were hospitalized after interacting with artificial intelligence chatbots will testify before a U.S. Senate panel on Tuesday, as lawmakers grapple with potential safeguards around the technology.】

item.title: 汉莎航空将在即将召开的股东大会上提议 Johannes Teyssen 担任监事会主席
item.description: 汉莎航空周二表示，将提议约翰内斯-泰森（Johannes Teyssen）在 2026 年 5 月举行的下一次股东大会上当选为监事会主席。【原文：Lufthansa said on Tuesday it would propose Johannes Teyssen to be elected as chair of the supervisory board at the airline's next general meeting in May 2026.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司首席执行官排除竞购 Spirit 资产的可能性
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）首席执行官斯科特-柯比（Scott Kirby）周二表示，如果破产的美国精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）的资产可用，他的公司不会参与竞购。【原文：United Airlines CEO Scott Kirby said on Tuesday his company is not going to make a bid for bankrupt Spirit Airlines' assets if they become available.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州总检察长调查代理顾问 Glass Lewis 和 ISS，ESG 引起反响
item.description: 德克萨斯州总检察长肯-帕克斯顿（Ken Paxton）周二对代理顾问公司 Glass Lewis 和机构股东服务公司（ISS）展开调查，指控它们可能误导了机构投资者和上市公司。【原文：Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton on Tuesday launched an investigation into proxy advisers Glass Lewis and Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS), alleging they may have misled institutional investors and public companies.】

item.title: 前派拉蒙主席 Shari Redstone 被任命为以色列制作工作室 Sipur 的主席
item.description: 媒体高管 Shari Redstone 已被任命为以色列娱乐工作室 Sipur 的主席，该工作室是获奖纪录片《我们将再次起舞》和 Netflix 的《坏小子》的幕后推手。【原文：Media executive Shari Redstone has been named chair of Israel-based entertainment studio Sipur, which is behind the award-winning documentary "We Will Dance Again" and Netflix's "Bad Boy".】

item.title: 阿根廷米莱公司将对核电站运营商实行部分私有化
item.description: 阿根廷总统发言人曼努埃尔-阿多尼（Manuel Adorni）周二表示，阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）将签署一项法令，对阿根廷核电公司（Nucleoelectrica Argentina）进行部分私有化。【原文：Argentine President Javier Milei will sign a decree to partially privatize Nucleoelectrica Argentina, the company operating the country's three functioning nuclear power plants, presidential spokesman Manuel Adorni said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 印度称与美国的贸易讨论 "积极"、"具有前瞻性
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普因印度购买俄罗斯石油而对其征收惩罚性关税之后，新德里表示，印度和美国官员周二进行的贸易讨论是 "积极的 "和 "前瞻性的"。【原文：Trade discussions between Indian and U.S. officials on Tuesday were "positive" and "forward-looking", New Delhi said, after President Donald Trump struck a more conciliatory tone following punitive tariffs on India over its Russian oil purchases.】

item.title: 加航称空乘人员工会要求取消调解
item.description: 加拿大航空公司（Air Canada）周二表示，在本月早些时候会员投票反对工资协议后，代表其空乘人员的工会要求取消调解。【原文：Air Canada said on Tuesday the union representing its flight attendants has requested a cancellation of mediation after members voted against a wage agreement earlier this month.】

item.title: 美国将考虑对汽车零部件征收新的国家安全关税
item.description: 美国商务部周二表示，以国家安全为由，将在未来几周内考虑对更多进口汽车零部件征收关税的行业请求。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said Tuesday it will consider industry requests to impose tariffs on additional imported auto parts in the coming weeks on national security grounds.】

item.title: 雪佛龙公司、以色列管道运营商将启动通往埃及的新天然气管道
item.description: 美国雪佛龙公司（Chevron）周二表示，该公司与以色列国有管道运营商签署了一项协议，将启动尼扎纳天然气管道的建设，把利维坦气田的天然气输送到埃及。【原文：Chevron signed a deal with Israel's state-owned pipeline operator to kickstart construction of the Nitzana natural gas pipeline to transport gas from the Leviathan gasfield to Egypt, the U.S. company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 为应对关税，礼来公司将投资 50 亿美元在弗吉尼亚州新建工厂
item.description: 礼来公司周二表示，它将投资 50 亿美元在弗吉尼亚州建造一座生产厂，这是该制药商计划在美国新建的四座工厂中的第一座，因为它将扩大国内生产，并对冲潜在的关税。【原文：Eli Lilly said on Tuesday it will invest $5 billion to build a manufacturing facility in Virginia, the first of four new U.S. plants the drugmaker has planned as it moves to expand domestic production and hedge against potential tariffs.】

item.title: MGX 与银湖共同投资收购 Altera
item.description: 阿布扎比人工智能投资公司、银湖（Silver Lake）的合作伙伴 MGX 周二表示，它已加入收购集团，收购了加州可编程芯片公司 Altera 的多数股权，英特尔只持有其 49% 的股份。【原文：MGX, an Abu Dhabi artificial intelligence investment firm and partner of Silver Lake, said on Tuesday it has joined the buyout group in acquiring a majority stake in California programmable chip business Altera, leaving Intel with a 49% holding.】

item.title: 美国 7 月商业库存温和增长
item.description: 政府数据显示，在销售激增的情况下，7 月份美国企业库存略有增加。【原文：U.S. business inventories increased marginally in July amid a surge in sales, government data showed.】

item.title: 汽车产量反弹，美国制造业产出意外增长
item.description: 尽管关税继续给制造业蒙上阴影，但由于汽车和一些非耐用品的产量回升，8月份美国工厂生产意外增长。【原文：U.S. factory production unexpectedly increased in August amid a rebound in the output of motor vehicles and some nondurable goods, though tariffs continued to cast a shadow over the manufacturing sector.】

item.title: 迪士尼、环球、华纳兄弟发现公司起诉中国 MiniMax 侵犯版权
item.description: 华特迪士尼、康卡斯特旗下的环球影业和华纳兄弟发现公司联合对中国 MiniMax 提起版权诉讼，称其图像和视频生成服务海洛 AI 是盗用了好莱坞三大电影公司的知识产权。【原文：Walt Disney , Comcast's Universal and Warner Bros Discovery have jointly filed a copyright lawsuit against China's MiniMax alleging that its image- and video-generating service Hailuo AI was built from intellectual property stolen from the three major Hollywood studios.】

item.title: 巴西财政部长认为未来几个月将降息
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周二表示，他预计未来几个月将开始降息，理由是拉丁美洲最大经济体的外汇前景更加有利。【原文：Brazilian Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said on Tuesday he expects interest rate cuts to begin in the coming months, citing a more favorable foreign exchange outlook in Latin America's largest economy.】

item.title: 以色列网络安全初创公司 Vega 融资 6500 万美元，估值 4 亿美元
item.description: 以色列网络安全初创公司 Vega 周二表示，该公司已在早期融资中筹集了 6500 万美元，估值达 4 亿美元。【原文：Israeli cybersecurity startup Vega said on Tuesday it had raised $65 million in early-stage financing rounds that valued it at $400 million.】

item.title: 瑞士银行声称首次使用公共区块链进行有约束力的支付
item.description: 瑞士银行家协会（SBA）周二表示，包括瑞银在内的三家瑞士银行首次使用银行存款和公共区块链进行了绑定支付。【原文：Three Swiss banks, including UBS , have carried out a binding payment using bank deposits and a public blockchain for the first time, the Swiss Bankers Association (SBA) said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国已为 TikTok 找到买家
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二表示，美国和中国已达成协议，短视频应用TikTok将继续在美国运营，其美国资产将从中国的字节跳动公司（ByteDance）移交给美国所有者，从而可能解决萦绕近一年的争议。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Tuesday that the U.S. and China have a deal that will keep the short-video app TikTok operating in the United States, transferring its U.S. assets to U.S. owners from China's ByteDance, potentially resolving a saga that has lingered for nearly a year.】
